<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72926</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9a506102-233f-11d8-8380-000acd021b2b#1#10</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Oroszország forradalmai 1917-ben</string>
            <string language="en">  Russian revolution in 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">  Russische Umdrehung 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">  Révolution russe en 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">  Volta russian em 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">  Giro russo in 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">  Ρωσική επανάσταση το 1917</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">  Revolución rusa en 1917</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A polgári demokratikus forradalom és a bolsevik hatalomátvétel</string>
            <string language="en">democratic revolution and the Bolsevic taking over of power</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Oroszország,  cár,  Miklós,  Romanov,  eszer,  kadet,  narodnyik,  mensevik,  kommunista,  Lenin,  Sztálin,  Trockij,  </string>
            <string language="en">Russia,  tsar,  Nicholas,  Romanov,  eszer,  kadet,  narodnyic,  mensevic,  kommunist,  Lenin,  Stalin,  Trockij,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">demokratische Umdrehung und das Bolsevic 
Übernehmen der Energie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">révolution démocratique et succéder de Bolsevic
de la puissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">volta democrática e o Bolsevic que faz exame do 
excesso da potência</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giro democratico ed assumere la direzione di 
Bolsevic dell'potenza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δημοκρατική επανάσταση και το Bolsevic που 
αναλαμβάνει της δύναμης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">revolución democrática y el asumir el control 
de Bolsevic de la potencia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rußland, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Lenin, Stalin, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Russie, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Lenin, Stalin, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rússia, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Lenin, Stalin, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Russia, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Lenin, Stalin, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωσία, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Λένιν, Στάλιν, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rusia, tsar, Nicholas, Romanov, eszer, kadet, 
narodnyic, mensevic, kommunist, Lenin, Stalin, Trockij,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">17-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>

version:3.0

fn:

end:vcard</entity>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:Pálfi;Zoltán;
fn:Zoltán Pálfi  
org:
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

              <id>590</id>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
